articles.content: Around this time last year, Justin Bieber put out his fifth album, Changes. It was meant to pick up where the hugely successful Purpose had left off five years earlier, while also ushering in a new e… [+4474 chars]

articles.author: Laura Fox, Deirdre Simonds
articles.title: Oscars 2021 bosses confirm Zoom speeches and hoodies are banned from Covid-safe ceremony - Daily Mail
articles.description: An email sent to nominees on Thursday revealed the ceremony will be strictly limited to nominees, presenters and their guests with 'no option' to accept their awards over Zoom.
articles.content: Bosses for the 2021 Academy Awards have confirmed that this year's ceremony won't see any of its winners accept their prizes via. Zoom, as plans for an intimate in-person celebration were revealed on… [+7146 chars]

articles.author: Rianne Addo, Olivia Wheeler
articles.title: Sarah Harding reveals she wants to have 'FFS' as her gravestone epitaph - Daily Mail
articles.description: In an extract from her new autobiography, Hear Me Out, the former Girls Aloud star, 39, insisted she would want 'FFS' as her epitaph to represent her 'most used phrase' during her battle.
articles.content:
Sarah Harding has admitted she's thought about her grave, after saying Christmas 2020 was 'probably her last'.
In an extract from her new autobiography, Hear Me Out, the former Girls Aloud star, 39,… [+16279 chars]
